title: Meditation Crystals + More
description: Each one of our organs, chakras, mind, and thoughts are individual vibrations. Crystals have a specific and clear vibration. By openly engaging with these vibrations, crystals can act as a tuning fork to help recalibrate your vibrations to a more Unified place, helping you to be more balanced physically, emotionally, and spiritually.
